channel.title: drunk on The Outsider's Journey
channel.description: Recent content in drunk on The Outsider's Journey

item.title: City Streets
item.description: From October 2007 Vehicle fumes bathe me as I walk the city streets. The roars of blue and white paid concentration cells, and lorries carrying rough blocks of granite vibrate my stomach.

item.title: Thakita Thadimi (Salangai Oli) Lyrics Translated
item.description: I recommend this beautiful movie to everyone. In this song, the uber-talented dancer has become an alcoholic and he sings and dances referring to the past he shares with the widow who is watching him.
